name: She: Chapter 2: Desperate Escape
description:
(Please note that this game is a nod to games such as Haunting Ground, Clock Tower and Project Zero. We've taken influences from these games to try and deliver a good little fan game of them. Thank You).

SHE: CHAPTER 2: Desperate Escape.

Following the events of
"She: Chapter 1: The Endless Nightmare",
Cody seems to be the only one left. All of his friends have vanished in this "mad house".

Searching for them, he happens to come across a locked door with a female voice coming from behind it.

Who could be in here? Is it Eve or Sally? What's happened to Samuel?
Ada, she has been gone for so long, Where's the Maid and the Master?
Are they going to kill us?

So many questions, but only you have the tools to find the answers.

She: Chapter 1: The Endless Nightmare, is AVAILABLE on gamejolt and rpgmaker.net, please feel free to head on over there and download it.

https://gamejolt.com/games/she-chapter-1-the-endless-nightmare/64896

Thank you all!

Team Crimson
